document.heading: Regulation of Body Artist and Body Art Establishments Clarifying Amendments Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-271, the “Regulation of Body Artist and Body Art Establishments Clarifying Amendments Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-920. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 22, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-633 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-271 became effective on April 23, 2013.
